tab1.text1: Hello and welcome to Neebs Family Community's Ark Server Cluster!/n/nExplore, level up, tame all the things and have fun! Remember to respect other community members and always follow NFCS rules. Please join our Discord at discord.gg/NFCS and join the PC Ark role to keep informed of server changes, outages, or create a support ticket in case any issues arise. We strive to give you one of the best player experiences around so if you're not happy, we're not happy! Be kind to each other and #WorldPeace!

tab2.text1:
Ini Header:

\[WBUI2]


INI-Options:

JsonURL="url"  -  default: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DC-Modding/WBUI2-Wiki/main/default.json"

You have to host the file as "raw" somewhere and enter the URL to it wrapped in " ". You can use github (linked below). After uploading the file you'll find a button called "raw". click the button and copy the URL. Or use any other hosting site which offers linking to a raw JSON output.

For a more detailed instruction checkout the Wiki linked down below.


You can trigger an update of the JSON via console command:
cheat scriptcommand WBUI2 update
